data.prayer: Father, encourage the 9,317 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Varna, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: There are 470,200 people living in the state of Varna. Only about 9,317 might be believers.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Varna, Bulgaria into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 9,317 believers in Varna, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Spirit, help the fearful in Varna, Bulgaria to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Varna, Bulgaria.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Varna, Bulgaria.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
